title: Wayfair | BLR | L2
content:
Education: Tier 2 college 
Years of Experience: 2
Prior Experience: Walmart IDC 
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: L2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 40 LPA ( all fixed )
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 2 LPA

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42 LPA

title: UBER | SDE2 (Level 4) | Hyderabad, India
content:
Education: Btech in IT from India
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: Microsoft IDC
Current TC: 37 LPA CTC
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Uber
Title/Level: SDE2 
Location: Hyderabad, India
Salary: 40 LPA INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 10 LPA INR
Bonus: 6.75 LPA INR
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 56.75
Benefits: Uber credits and phone reimbursement and fitness - 1.5LPA approx
Other details: I have an offer from Amazon Dublin as well and want to compare both: https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5412595/Amazon-or-SDE2-L5-or-Dublin
